title: How to Get Teenage Sims Pregnant in The Sims 2

steps.title: Download InTeenimater.
steps.content: Download InTeenimater. InTeenimater, usually abbreviated to InTeen , is the most well-known teen pregnancy mod for Sims 2. Go to https://simfileshare.net/folder/92525/ in a web browser. Click on the folder for your latest expansion pack. (If you're running the Ultimate Collection, click "apartment-life". If you're on a Mac running the Super Collection, click "bon-voyage".) Click on the first file in the list, labeled InTeenimater_Final[ expansion ].zip . (The exact file name will vary depending on the version you're installing.) Click on the blue Download button to download the InTeenimater. If you want to download the Flavor Paks, open the Sim File Share folder, go to the folder for your latest expansion, click on InTeenimater_Final[...]FlavorPak.zip , and press the blue Download button. (If running the Ultimate Collection, you should also download the Hotfix in the Apartment Life folder.)

steps.title: Unzip the InTeen files.
steps.content: Unzip the InTeen files. The files for InTeen are stored in .zip files, so you'll need to get them out first. On Windows: Either double-click the file to view the contents, or use 7Zip, right-click on the file, and choose Extract here . On Mac: Double-click the file to unzip it through Archive Utility.

steps.title: Place files A through F in your game's Downloads folder.
steps.content: Place files A through F in your game's Downloads folder. Within the main InTeen folder are several files. Depending on the version you're installing, they'll either be titled InTeenimater_A.package or zzzInTeenimater_A.package , and the files will go from A to F. Click once on the InTeenimater_A file to select it. Hold ⇧ Shift and click once on InTeenimater_F to select all of the files. On Windows, press Ctrl + X to cut the files; on Mac, press ⌘ Cmd + C . Open Documents. Open the EA Games folder. Open the The Sims 2 folder. Open the Downloads folder in your The Sims 2 folder. Paste the files into Downloads. On Windows, press Ctrl + V ; on Mac, press ⌘ Cmd + ⌥ Option + V .

steps.title: Put InTeenimater_G in your game files (if applicable).
steps.content: Put InTeenimater_G in your game files (if applicable). The FreeTime and Apartment Life/Ultimate Collection versions of InTeen require a folder be placed in your game directory. (If you're not installing the FreeTime or Apartment Life versions, skip this step.) Open File Explorer . Open the C: drive. Open the Program Files (x86) folder. If you're running the CD versions of the game: Open the EA Games folder. Open the The Sims 2 folder. Open the folder for the appropriate expansion. (If you're installing the FreeTime version, open the FreeTime folder; if you're installing the Apartment Life version, open the Apartment Life folder.) Open the TSData folder. Open the Res folder. Open the Overrides folder. Place zzzInTeenimater_G.package into the Overrides folder. If you're running the Ultimate Collection: Open the Origin Games folder. Open the The Sims 2 Ultimate Collection folder. Open the Fun with Pets folder. Open the SP9 folder. Open the TSData folder. Open the Res folder. Open the Overrides folder. Place zzzInTeenimater_G.package into the Overrides folder.

steps.title: Install Flavor Paks in your game's Downloads folder (optional).
steps.content: Install Flavor Paks in your game's Downloads folder (optional). If you choose to use any Flavor Paks to modify how InTeen works, place them in your game's Downloads folder like you did with InTeen files A through F. Read the manual included in the folder to determine which Flavor Paks you want to use. Do not drop in all the files at once. Two files ( CollegeAdmissions and NoAdultTeens ) are incompatible and will cause problems if you add them together. The Flavor Paks are optional add-ons. You don't need to use them for InTeen to work.

steps.title: Enable custom content and restart your game.
steps.content: Enable custom content and restart your game. When you start your game after installing InTeen, a popup will appear saying that you have custom content in your game. Click on "Enable custom content", hit the checkmark, and then restart your game.

steps.title: Play the Sim that you want pregnant.
steps.content: Play the Sim that you want pregnant. Your Sim cannot get pregnant if they're not part of the active household, and using Make Selectable won't work properly.

steps.title: Invite the Sim's partner over.
steps.content: Invite the Sim's partner over. Use the phone to call your Sim's partner and invite them over to the lot, or invite them out.

steps.title: Build up your Sim's relationship with their partner.
steps.content: Build up your Sim's relationship with their partner. If your Sim's relationship with their partner is too low, they'll get rejected for WooHoo. Have them talk, joke, and perform romantic interactions together until their Daily and Lifetime relationships are both at about 75 or higher.

steps.title: Pick a spot for them to WooHoo.
steps.content: Pick a spot for them to WooHoo. In order for your Sim to get pregnant, they'll need to have somewhere to WooHoo. Your Sims can Try for Baby in a: Double bed Hot tub Car Changing booth Photo booth Elevator Tent Hammock Sauna Walk-in closet Helicopter

steps.title: Choose Try for Baby.
steps.content: Choose Try for Baby . Click on the WooHoo location or the other Sim and choose Try for Baby . Once your Sims have completed the action, you'll hear a lullaby chime play if your Sim has gotten pregnant. Your Sim won't always get pregnant the first try. If you don't hear the lullaby the first time, try again. If you're using the Silent Pregnancy add-on, choose WooHoo instead - the Try for Baby option won't come up. You will also not hear the lullaby, even if your Sim is pregnant. Either wait to see if your Sim gets morning sickness, or use the Biological Clock (or a similar object like the Sim Blender) to check their pregnancy status.

steps.title: Use the Biological Clock for brevity.
steps.content: Use the Biological Clock for brevity. If you don't want to spend a lot of time making your Sim get pregnant, you can use the Biological Clock to force a pregnancy, regardless of the gender of the Sim or their relationships with others. Make sure the Sim you want to father the child is on the lot. (Invite them over with the phone, or use a custom teleporter like the SimBlender to summon them.) Click on your teen Sim and select InTeenimater... . Click on My Biological Clock . A small alarm clock should spawn nearby. Click on the alarm clock. Select I Want a Baby With... , and then select the Sim who you want to father the child. The selected Sim will now be pregnant.

steps.title: Make two adult Sims.
steps.content: Make two adult Sims. You can either create them in Create-a-Sim or choose a preexisting adult couple. They must be adults in order for this method to work. There are limitations to this method; even when "teens", your Sims will always be treated as adults. They cannot go to school, sneak out, or do any actions that teens can do.

steps.title: Enable testingcheats.
steps.content: Enable testingcheats. Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + C , enter boolprop testingcheatsenabled true , and hit ↵ Enter .

steps.title: Spawn the needed debugging objects.
steps.content: Spawn the needed debugging objects. In order to use this method, you'll need to spawn the Tombstone of Life and Death, and the Sim Modder. Hold down ⇧ Shift and click on a Sim. Choose Spawn... , and then find Tombstone of L and D . A tombstone will appear near your Sim. Hold ⇧ Shift , click on a Sim, and choose Spawn... . Search for Sim Modder . This will spawn an upright baby doll.

steps.title: Age one Sim down to a teenager.
steps.content: Age one Sim down to a teenager. Click on the Sim Modder, and choose Select Age... . Choose your Sim's name, and click Teen . Don't age both Sims down at once. You need a Sim on the lot to recover the other Sim.

steps.title: Delete the Sim before the aging process ends.
steps.content: Delete the Sim before the aging process ends. Once the confetti has just burst and the teen is admiring themselves, shift-click on them and choose Force Error . An error dialogue will pop up; click Delete . The Sim will disappear from the lot and the sidebar.

steps.title: Recover the "teen".
steps.content: Recover the "teen". Click the Tombstone of Life and Death, select Get Family Member... , and select the name of the Sim you deleted. They should reappear near the tombstone, and will look like a teen, but will be using the adult age bar and will float slightly.

steps.title: Repeat the process with the second Sim.
steps.content: Repeat the process with the second Sim. Once you've recovered the first Sim, age the second Sim down, delete them, and recover them the same way you did with the first Sim.

steps.title: Have the Sims Try for Baby.
steps.content: Have the Sims Try for Baby. Once you've finished aging the Sims to "teens", send them to Try for Baby using a double bed (or another object that allows for WooHoo, like a hot tub or car). When they complete the action, a lullaby chime may play, indicating that your Sim is pregnant!
